headline: SoCalGas Issues Statement on Southern California Edison's Eaton Litigation
summary: On January 16, 2026, Southern California Edison (Edison) filed cross–claims in the ongoing Eaton Fire litigation against more than a dozen defendants, including Southern California Gas Company (SoCalGas).
